title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
ntelligence roll to obfuscate the location of the Druid Grove to Minthara Say "You do not need the prisoner" and then win the Intelligence roll to obfuscate the location of the Druid Grove to Minthara Defend Sazza from Minthara's accusation and say "Sazza didn't know" Inform Roah if you wiped out the Zhenterim Hideout Tell Halsin "I'll deal with this, you get to safety" after rescuing him in the Worg Pens Tell the True Soul Gut "All right. I'm ready" after following her to somewhere private.
